Features new in release GT &shortversion;:
Nothing new since GT &previousversion;.

Other Supported Features
Submit, control and monitor jobs at a grid level. Create and manage advanced reservations at the grid level. Send job and advanced reservation operations to local resource managers. A plug in scheduler interface so that site and user specific scheduling policies can be implemented regardless of the underlying resource manager. Create queues of jobs, each with separately definable scheduling policies.
